name: 曾德樟
objective:
Lab 0 Introduction to LabVIEW 
Lab 1 Signal and System 
Lab 2 Amplitude Modulation
Lab 3 Frequency Modulation
Lab 4 Digital Modulation (I): PSK, FSK, ASK 
Lab 5 Digital Modulation (II): DPSK, MSK 
Lab 6 Digital Modulation (III): QAM, PAM
schedule:
Lab 0 Introduction to LabVIEW (1 weeks)
Lab 1 Signal and System (2 weeks)
Lab 2 Amplitude Modulation (2 weeks)
Lab 3 Frequency Modulation (2 weeks)
Lab 4 Digital Modulation (I): PSK, FSK, ASK (3 weeks)
Lab 5 Digital Modulation (II): DPSK, MSK (3 weeks)
Lab 6 Digital Modulation (III): QAM, PAM (3 weeks)
scorePolicy:
1. 期中報告
2. 期末報告
3. 出席率
materials:
1. 莊智清 等編著 通訊系統設計與實習 (全華圖書)
